GSD.description:
ext4: fix i_version handling in ext4

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 6eec744d48e8b5ebe313e1409111e75fad8e2961. For more details please see the references link.
